ygData.subject: Water Crystal Staff (was Lambent Stones)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... range slot) That would be an interesting sight. :) Is it just me, or does anyone else who has only heard of the Water Crystal Staff picture this clear rod
ygData.messageBody:
> Kaleid
> 20th Song
> Prexus
> <Wave of the Dark Tide>
> --he who continually gets VERY confused looks from passing bards when they
> witness him Dual Wielding a Mithril Quill and Water Crystal Staff (DD in
range slot)

That would be an interesting sight. :)

Is it just me, or does anyone else who has only heard of the Water Crystal
Staff picture this clear rod with a globe on top filled with lake water and
a skittish goldfish bobbing around waiting for the proc to make his eyes bug
out? Just me, you say? Ok, thanks!

Operaman
Time to put the mouse down and step away from the monitor
Innoruuk
